data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Bahraich, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bahraich, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Bahraich to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Bahraich, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Bahraich, Uttar Pradesh, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 3,487,700 citizens of the the county of Bahraich.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jat Dhankar people.
Father, we pray that the county of Bahraich be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Bahraich access to a Bible in their own language.
Jesus, please give your people in Bahraich, Uttar Pradesh, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

location.name: Bahraich
location.people_groups_list: Lakhera, Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions), Faqir, Gadaria Dhingar, Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Lakhera (189,000), Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions) (1,100), Faqir (90,000), Gadaria Dhingar (1,188,000), Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) (273,000)
